title: Hot Chocolate Cake
directions: In a large bowl, mix the dry ingredients together and blend hot water with hot chocolate mix in another bowl.
Pour the water and chocolate mixture slowly into the dry mixture and stir until well combined.
Pour the batter in a bundt pan and bake in a preheated oven to 350° for 1 hour.
In a saucepan, melt the butter and mix in the marshmallows until smooth and well combined.
Once the cake is cooled, pour the frosting over it and let set before serving.
ingredients: 1 cup of starbucks hot chocolate mix.
1 ½ cups of hot boiling water.
